local_intent: Execute the transfer push: align to t_block, set yaw 90°, push 0.1 m at 90°, and verify visibility.

coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT steps for the transfer phase: detect t_block, approach+align (0.01), set yaw 90, push 0.1 at 90, then verify.
